text: wadhkru 'ayuha almuminun nieam allah ealaykum 'iidh 'antum b"mk" qlylw aleadad mqhwrwn, takhafun 'an yakhdhkm alkufaar bsret, fajaeal lakum mawa tawwn 'iilayh wahu "almdyn", wqwwakm binasrih ealayhim yawm "bdr", watemkm min altayibat -alty min jmltha alghnaym-; likay tashkuruu lah ealaa ma razaqakum wanem bih elykm
